data.name: Adventure Fitness VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
This demo shows the first level of our upcoming game which was inspired from pictures of the Zhangjiajie national forest park in China. We will be working on three other courses for release set in Norway, Italy, and California and intend to make more levels in the future, as they are fun to build :).

It features arm swing to run controls, zip lines, climbing walls, rope climbs, ducking sections, and monkey bars.

Our team record right now on this course is around 9 minutes, so please let us know on twitter if you are able to finish it faster :).

We are also in general putting this out there as we are looking for feedback from users on the game, so please let us know what you liked and disliked so we can improve our eventual release!

Thanks very much for your time trying out our experience, we hope you enjoy!

data.short_description: Fancy a real life speedrun? Adventure Fitness VR is the ultimate VR obstacle course set in exotic locations, designed with real arm swing and climbing controls that will elevate your heart rate as well as your spirit.

data.legal_notice:
All players playing the VR demo do so at their own risk, playing a game with a virtual reality headset on takes you into a situation where you are no longer aware of your surroundings so we advise it is best to do so with a chaperone watching the player (as is usually the case with any VR game).

Please ensure you have a clear VR playing space and take caution as you are playing. If you feel uncomfortable at any time stop playing immediately.
